Act, No. 85 of 1977 . .
AN ACT TO PROVIDB FOR THE ACQUISITION FOR TRE

BORILY, OF ANY BUSINESS UNDERTAXING, FOR THE
REQUISITIONING OB COMPULSORY ACQUISITION OF

THAT UNDERTAKING AND FOR MATEEAS CONNECTED .
